item.title: Serial Communication between Arduino Uno and LabView - Upwork
item.description:
I am using an accelerometer AST1001 (Tinycircuits) which communicates with Arduino Uno (through I2C). I want to send the x,y and z data coming from the sensor in Arduino to LabView through USB port. There is an existing VI for my other device application and I want to incorporate this serial comm (Arduino to LabView) in this VI. I tried doing it but the problem is LabView is not able to red the data coming from Arduino in sync. There is always a delay of 30 to 60 seconds. Kindly help to fix this!


Posted On: May 17, 2024 16:27 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Tableau, Python, Java, Microsoft Excel, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Analytics, Autodesk, LabVIEW, Autodesk Inventor, Data Analytics, Data Structures, macOS

item.title: SQL automating Dynamic Data Extraction and Transformation for Power BI Reporting - Upwork
item.description:
Project Description:
We are seeking an experienced SQL and ETL specialist to assist us in automating the data extraction and transformation process for Power BI reporting. We have software where users can create their own forms. The data from these forms is stored in various tables within a SQL database.

Currently, manually crafting queries and merging these tables to generate usable reports in Power BI is a complex process. We aim to automate and simplify this process so that dynamic forms can be easily and directly converted into a usable format for Power BI.

Project Requirements:

1. Analysis of Current Data Structure:
Understand and document the current database structure and data relationships.

2. Dynamic SQL View Creation:
Develop a stored procedure that creates dynamic views based on available forms and fields.
These views should automatically select and present the correct columns in a flat format suitable for Power BI.

3. ETL Pipeline Development:
Develop an ETL pipeline (preferably in Python) that periodically extracts, transforms, and loads the data into a reporting table in the database.
This pipeline must be flexible enough to automatically detect and process new forms and fields.

4. Documentation and Handover:
Provide comprehensive documentation of the developed system, including instructions for adding new forms and maintaining the system.
Transfer knowledge and code to our internal team to enable them to perform maintenance and make any necessary adjustments.

Required Skills:
- Extensive experience with SQL and relational databases.
- Experience developing dynamic SQL queries and views.
- Knowledge of ETL processes and tools.
- Experience in data modeling and transformation for reporting purposes, especially for Power BI.
- Strong documentation skills and the ability to transfer knowledge to an internal team.

Project Type:
One-time project with the potential for ongoing collaboration for future expansions and maintenance.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00
Posted On: May 17, 2024 14:32 UTC
Category: Data Extraction
Skills:SQL, ETL, Data Modeling
Skills: SQL, ETL, Data Modeling
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Excel Dashboard Developer for Textile Industry Environmental Impact Data - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
Join bAwear, a leading provider of environmental impact data solutions for the global textile industry, as an Excel dashboard developer.

We're seeking an experienced professional to create customized dashboards that visualize and analyze environmental impact data, including global warming potential, fossil energy use, water consumption, and land use.

The job:
1. Develop interactive Excel dashboards to analyze environmental impact data for textile manufacturing.
2. Enable comparisons, identify trends, and benchmark against industry standards.
3. Automate repetitive tasks and streamline dashboard creation processes.

Requirements:
1. Proven experience in developing advanced Excel dashboards, particularly in environmental or sustainability contexts.
2. Expertise in Excel, including formulas, pivot tables, charts, and VBA/macros.
3. Familiarity with environmental impact metrics and standards, preferably in textiles.
4. Strong attention to detail and ability to create visually appealing and informative dashboards.
5. Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively.

Nice to Have:
1. Knowledge of sustainability metrics and standards specific to textiles.
2. Experience with other data visualization tools or programming languages.
3. Understanding of database management and data warehousing concepts.

Deliverables:
1. A template Excel dashboard for textile environmental impact data.
2. Documentation and user guide for the dashboards.
Support for integrating data sources and maintaining the dashboards.

How to Apply - Please include in your proposal:
1. Relevant experience in developing Excel dashboards for environmental or sustainability data.
2. Examples of previous work related to Excel dashboard development.
3. Estimated time to complete the project.
4. Proposed approach to designing and implementing the dashboards.

This project offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to environmental sustainability in the textile industry through innovative data visualization. We look forward to receiving your proposals.

Read more about us - https://bawear.eu/


Hourly Range: $10.00-$60.00
Posted On: May 17, 2024 12:08 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Dashboard, API Integration, Data Visualization, Google Sheets, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Microsoft Excel, Business Intelligence, Graphic Design
Skills: Dashboard, API Integration, Data Visualization, Google Sheets, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Microsoft Excel, Business Intelligence, Graphic Design
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Power BI Expert for Departmental Dashboard Creation and Automation - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
I hope this message finds you well. I have an important task that requires your expertise, and I would greatly appreciate your guidance on completing it.

Available Tools and Software:
To help you provide the best possible solution, here are the tools and software we have on our PCs for this task:
• Word/ Excel / Power BI / Power Automate / Power Query / Microsoft Lists / Outlook / SharePoint / OneDrive

Background:
Within our company, there are 10 departments. Each department produces daily reports with a significant amount of data. These reports are sent daily via Outlook to Department A, which is responsible for collecting and storing them in PC memory, OneDrive, and SharePoint. Each department has its own folder, named by the department’s name, where their daily reports are saved.

Your Task:
• Create an example dashboard (proof of concept) and prepare a step-by-step guideline for company employees who will be responsible for preparing these dashboards in the future.
• Ensure the guideline is easy to follow for employees with begginers/intermediate knowledge of computers, Windows, and Microsoft applications.

Company Objective:
We aim to prepare individual dashboards for each department using data from their daily reports. Each dashboard should:
• Include data from all the daily reports for the department since the beginning of 2024.
• Allow us to select and display reports from specific dates.
• Enable easy switching between dates within the same dashboard.
• Visually present the data in tables, charts, columns, and lines.

Company Future Automation Goal:
In the future, we want the following to be possible:
• Automatically save incoming daily reports from Outlook to SharePoint or OneDrive.
• Automatically update the respective department’s Power BI dashboard with new reports from SharePoint/OneDrive.
• Ensure immediate access to today's current report (the latest report from SharePoint/OneDrive) upon opening the Power BI link for the department's dashboard.
• Provide immediate access to view and select data from any date, past or present.

Next Steps:
If you need more details about the structure of the daily reports and the specific data to be presented on the dashboards, please let me know. I can provide an example report and explain the necessary data. We can discuss these details further once you confirm your capability to handle this task.

Request for Confirmation:
Please confirm if you are capable of completing this task and providing us with a tutorial for future reference. If you agree, I will send you an example table and images to help you prepare.
If you are able to complete this task and provide a clear tutorial for future use, I will undoubtedly give you a 5-star rating. Payment will be smooth and prompt.

I look forward to your response and to working with you on this project.



Posted On: May 17, 2024 09:20 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Power Automate
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Power Automate
Country: Serbia
click to apply

item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Supermarket Data BI Analyst to join our team. As a BI Analyst, you will be responsible for analyzing and interpreting complex data sets to provide actionable insights for our supermarket business. You will work closely with our data team to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for improvement. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data analysis, proficiency in BI tools such as Power BI or Tableau, and excellent communication skills.    

Responsibilities:
- Collect and analyze supermarket data
- Develop and maintain BI dashboards and reports
- Identify trends and patterns to drive decision-making
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs
- Present findings and recommendations to stakeholders

Requirements:
- Proven experience in supermarket data analysis
- Proficiency in BI tools (Power BI, Tableau, etc.)
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and presentation abilities

item.title: Power BI Expert| Data Science | Physics Measures - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an analyst on a part-time or full-time basis who can work many hours a week depending on availability and skillset (any time zone is fine)

You will be required to log on remotely to complete certain tasks. Time is required or we can switch to a per-milestone contract

MUST HAVE HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION and at least 16GB Of RAM on the computer. Microsoft PowerBI installed

MUST BE WILLING TO VALIDATE WORK, it is not enough to write a formula and hope for the best

Looking for an experienced business analyst
Examples of tasks:
-Create a report from SQL DB (MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle, Snowflake)
-Finding insights and drawing conclusions
- Statistical analysis using JMP|SAS|
- Some knowledge of physics and highly technical measures
-Creating reports or dashboards in PowerBI or PowerPoint
-Asking questions, and figuring out answers to problems by being proactive



NOT LOOKING FOR A DEVELOPER who JUST FOLLOWS ORDERS looking for someone who can provide solutions and ASK QUESTIONS.


40% of the time is spent analyzing data. It is not enough to create a measure or show a chart must dig into the data. What is the data telling us? these fields are blank is this ok? so many nulls is this right? etc.

40% asking the right questions in order to comprehend and create the business intelligence report. being innovative and condensing disparate pieces of data into actionable insights or succinct reports for senior executives. Proficient with PowerBI, Mcode, and DAX

20 % documentation to help translate business requirements to technical requirements

-Use current and emerging Statistics, Machine Learning and Data Science methods
Innovate new analytic solutions that serve unmet customer needs
communicate analytical results clearly and succinctly-
-Work closely with me to make value-added analytical services available to stakeholders
-Be creative, collaborative in nature, and a self-starter

Must have:
PowerBI
SQL (CTE's, window functions, etc)
Understanding of statistics using R or Python
Some knowledge of statistical viz packages such as JMP, SAS



Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: May 17, 2024 01:09 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Machine Learning, Salesforce, Finance, Tableau, R, Microsoft PowerApps
Skills: SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Machine Learning, Salesforce, Finance, Tableau, R, Microsoft PowerApps
Country: United States

item.title: Experienced Developer Needed for Inventory App using Microsoft Power Apps - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced developer to create a comprehensive inventory app using Microsoft Power Apps. The app will initially focus on inventory management and must be accessible on both smartphones and PCs. However, it is expected to evolve to include features such as delivery schedule  and purchase order management in the future.

Responsibilities:

-Develop a user-friendly inventory app using Microsoft Power Apps.
-Ensure seamless functionality across both smartphone and PC platforms.
-Collaborate with our team to understand requirements and incorporate necessary features.
-Integrate additional functionalities as the app evolves, including delivery schedule estimation, job award scheduling, and purchase order management.
Requirements:

Proficiency in Microsoft Power Apps development.
Experience creating inventory management systems or similar applications.
Ability to design and implement user-friendly interfaces.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with a remote team.
Nice to Have:

Previous experience developing delivery schedules or purchase order management systems.
Familiarity with integrating Power Apps with other Microsoft services such as Power BI and SharePoint.
If you are passionate about app development and have the skills and experience necessary to create a dynamic inventory app using Microsoft Power Apps, we encourage you to apply. Please include examples of your previous work and a brief overview of your relevant experience. We look forward to hearing from you!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: May 16, 2024 21:04 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Personal Computer, iOS Development, Android App Development, Microsoft PowerApps, Smartphone, iOS, Android, Tablet, Microsoft Windows, API

item.title: Business Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Business Analyst
Company Name: International Markets Live Inc.
Location: Remote

Are you ready to elevate your career and become a pivotal part of a thriving team? IM Academy, a leading online financial education company, is celebrating almost 11 years of success across Europe, Asia, the Middle East, the United States, and Latin America. We are on a mission to enhance our operational efficiency and effectiveness by inviting a team of highly skilled Business Analyst to join our global team.

Requirements/Qualification
1. Power BI Expertise:
• Proficiency in using Microsoft Power BI for creating and managing dashboards and reports.
• Experience with data modeling, visualization, and reporting in Power BI.
• Knowledge of Power BI service and Power BI Desktop.
2. SQL and Database Skills:
• Strong MySQL skills for querying, analyzing, and manipulating data across various database platforms.
• Experience with relational databases such as SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, or similar technologies.
3. Data Analysis and Management:
• Ability to analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
• Experience with data cleaning, transformation, and preparation for analysis.
• Proficient in using Excel or similar tools for data manipulation and analysis.
4. Problem-Solving and Troubleshooting:
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to address and resolve data-related issues.
• Experience in troubleshooting and resolving issues related to data refreshes, connectivity, and performance in Power BI and other data platforms.
5. Technical Communication:
• Ability to communicate technical information effectively to non-technical stakeholders.
• Experience in documenting technical processes, data models, and design decisions.
6. Project Management:
• Skills in managing data analytics projects from inception through completion.
• Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.



Posted On: May 16, 2024 18:40 UTC
Category: Business Analysis & Strategy
Skills:Requirement Analysis, Business Analysis, Financial Analysis
Skills: Requirement Analysis, Business Analysis, Financial Analysis
Country: United States
click to apply

Location: Remote

Are you ready to elevate your career and become a pivotal part of a thriving team? IM Academy, a leading online financial education company, is celebrating almost 11 years of success across Europe, Asia, the Middle East, the United States, and Latin America. We are on a mission to enhance our operational efficiency and effectiveness by inviting a team of highly skilled Business Analyst to join our global team.

Requirements/Qualification
1. Power BI Expertise:
• Proficiency in using Microsoft Power BI for creating and managing dashboards and reports.
• Experience with data modeling, visualization, and reporting in Power BI.
• Knowledge of Power BI service and Power BI Desktop.
2. SQL and Database Skills:
• Strong MySQL skills for querying, analyzing, and manipulating data across various database platforms.
• Experience with relational databases such as SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, or similar technologies.
3. Data Analysis and Management:
• Ability to analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
• Experience with data cleaning, transformation, and preparation for analysis.
• Proficient in using Excel or similar tools for data manipulation and analysis.
4. Problem-Solving and Troubleshooting:
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to address and resolve data-related issues.
• Experience in troubleshooting and resolving issues related to data refreshes, connectivity, and performance in Power BI and other data platforms.
5. Technical Communication:
• Ability to communicate technical information effectively to non-technical stakeholders.
• Experience in documenting technical processes, data models, and design decisions.
6. Project Management:
• Skills in managing data analytics projects from inception through completion.
• Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.

item.title: Power BI Live Data - Upwork
item.description:
Windows Server. PostgreSQL DB.

Power BI already connected to DB. Need to make data integration live so that when new data enters the DB that power BI instantly receives this data and analyses it. Then Power BI must send notifications for this new data according to the rules we set. Have part time in house developer who has connected DB and can set rules.

Needs assistance with Live Integration (no need to refresh) and Instant notifications (via email)

Experts in Power BI apply only
$100 for this task is non negotiable. No hourly wage/salary. Expect task to be finished in 2 days maximum.
Need project to begin and finish ASAP!

Potential future work after this.

Thank you

Budget: $100

item.description:
Data Specialist:

The Data Specialist is responsible for providing information that is in databases, organizing and assembling the information so that teams can make decisions using data.

Responsabilities:

- Access database.

- Create dashboards and analysis according to the demand of the business areas.

- Update and automate dashboards that need frequent updating.

- Provide suggestions of improvements in business areas.

Requirements:

- Mandarim is a must

- SQL

- Office Package

- Database usage
